text: Donald Arthur Gehrmann (November 16, 1927 - July 23, 2022) was an American middle-distance runner. He competed in the 1500 m final at the 1948 Summer Olympics and came in eighth place. Gehrmann was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Gehrmann died on July 23, 2022 at the age of 94.Don Gehrmann ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American middle-distance runners Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Milwaukee
title: Don Gehrmann
